hadiths.text: Salamah bin Al Akwa said “After the revelation of the verse “For those who can do it(with hardship) is a ransom, the feeding of one, that is indigent, is one of us intended to leave fast and pay ransom, he could do so.” until the verse following it was revealed and abrogated the (previous) verse.”

chapter.ara-name: باب نَسْخِ قَوْلِهِ { وَعَلَى الَّذِينَ يُطِيقُونَهُ فِدْيَةٌ }
chapter.eng-name: Abrogation Of The Saying Of Allah, Most High: As For Those Who Can Fast With Difficulty Is A Ransom
